sub_title: Scrum Master @GFT Group | SSM SAFe 6 Certified | Agile Evangelist | Change Agent | Digital Transformation Designer
summary:
Regardless of my role, I can always contribute to a visionary mindset, creating purpose-driven solutions with a high social impact. 
By using Design Thinking, I empower individuals working strategically towards a mindset innovation.

- Innovation
- Digital Transformation

My personality type is DISC DI (Initiator).

projects.title: Volvo Group x Hyper Island
projects.description:
Hyper Island hosted, in collaboration with the Volvo Group Connected Solutions Innovation Lab, a 48h hackathon. We were challenged to explore the future growth with electric vehicle services, and find business- and communication design solutions in this area.

Further details are under a confidentiality agreement.

projects.title: FATTA! x Hyper Island
projects.description:
FATTA is a Swedish NGO working with the new consent laws in Sweden, and challenged us at Hyper Island to find new communication and marketing solutions in how to spread awareness of the changes to Swedish consent laws. The objectives were to increase their SoMe following, change the public's perception and find new ways to create a consent culture.

Further details are under a confidentiality agreement.

contributors.headline: Scrum Master @GFT Group | SSM SAFe 6 Certified | Agile Evangelist | Change Agent | Digital Transformation Designer

projects.title: Volvo Group Hackathon "How to solve problems within urban construction logistics?"
projects.description:
I was involved in three days of joy and exciting challenges finding, How to solve problems within urban construction logistics?.
Our solution was an app, called TASKTAG: A digitalized to-do list, a reminder & gamification tool that will keep site managers in touch and in good communication will all other staff.

projects.title: Justice in the Digital Society
projects.description:
Collaboration between the Ministry of Department of Justice and Security & Digital Society School.
The goal is to identify the main challenges that The Custodial Institutions Agency's caregivers see and what role technology plays in these challenges now and in the near future. The opportunities for a positive impact of technology need to be explored.

contributors.headline: Scrum Master @GFT Group | SSM SAFe 6 Certified | Agile Evangelist | Change Agent | Digital Transformation Designer

projects.title: We Are Stockholm
projects.description:
Working alongside with "Perfect Fools" and "SthlmOp" as a Student Coach, we worked with six student to create a new Communication Strategy for the "WeAreStockholm" festival.

The experience was an excellent opportunity to put in practice my facilitation tools at work with teenagers. 

As a student coach, I got the chance to develop my leadership, strategy thinking, and creative direction.

Moreover, I gave a big support to a working group together with the agency supervisor.

contributors.headline: Scrum Master @GFT Group | SSM SAFe 6 Certified | Agile Evangelist | Change Agent | Digital Transformation Designer

projects.title: FreeSpee, "Culture Creation and Change Management"
projects.description:
My team and I, was given the chance by Freespee to study and observe their workspace and culture for a period of 6 weeks. During those weeks, 6 interviews with staff along with several observations were conducted. 
We helped Freespee to develop a feedback culture and how to improve efficiency and productivity. Furthermore, help them to address and deal internal conflicts as well as, if applicable, look into potential actions and tools to face them.
The result was presented for Freespee at their office along with a hand out covering all of the findings.

projects.title: ICA x Hyper Island
projects.description:
ICA's newly founded innovation lab, ICAx, challenged us to explore new solutions on how to the future of living in 'smart homes' would look like. Our team were specifically tasked with developing concepts on How might we rethink waste that is created at home?.

Further details are under a confidentiality agreement.

courses.name: Elements of Artificial Intelligence from University of Helsinki

profile_positions.description:
- Driving the integration of AI into valuable operational applications, connecting methods with opportunities with an eye on organizational effectiveness, infrastructure, technologies, and tools.

- Working closely with AI Sweden partners (corporates, SME's, Startups, Academia, and the public sector) to identify high-impact challenges and opportunities and convert them into AI use cases. Able to conceptualize solutions, scope and develop applied research- and innovation projects, and apply for funding when needed.

- Applying AI Maturity Assessment tool, to understand the current AI readiness, identify areas for improvement, build an AI roadmap & introduce AI at scale in organizations.
profile_positions.title: AI Change Agent

profile_positions.description:
Founded PLAYFESSIONAL, due to my passion for individuals, and the power of teamwork. 
The mission was to make workplaces playfully professional and inclusive, incorporating fun into meetings or workshops. 
I have facilitated trainings, workshops and coaching sessions in all areas of the organization:
- Leadership Training
- Organizational Development
- Team Development
- Conflicts Resolution

Managed a variety of tasks, starting from scratches, such as:
- Ideation and Creative process
- Planning crucial functions as a new company
- Communication & negotiation with different stakeholders to build a strong relationship for future deals.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder | Learning Designer

profile_positions.description:
Assisted and guided Zenseact on its transformational AI journey and support in effectively planning and executing the right activities to start with or advance with AI. 
Focused on:
- understand current AI readiness
- identify areas for improvement
- build an AI roadmap
- introduce AI at scale in their organization
profile_positions.title: AI Change Agent

profile_positions.description:
- Accomplished a design-driven project, working closely with the Ministry of Justice of The Netherlands, and together come up with tools, prototypes, and solutions to inspire a mindset change regarding technological innovation in the working field.

- Contributed to stimulating innovation in the practice of justice by implementing and using new tools, trends, and methods to bring awareness of current and future digital technology to our stakeholders, The Ministry of Justice of the Netherlands.
